texts.SettingManagement:001001: A setting definition called {Name} already exists!
texts.SettingManagement:001010: The {Name} static setting is not allowed to change!
texts.DisplayName:Name: Name
texts.Description:IsVisibleToClients: It maybe dangerous for some settings to be visible to clients (such as an email server password).
texts.Description:IsInherited: Is this setting inherited from parent scopes.
texts.Description:IsEncrypted: Is this setting stored as encrypted in the data source.
texts.Description:Providers: A list of allowed providers to get/set value of this setting, An empty list indicates that all providers are allowed.
texts.Description:ExtraProperties: Can be used to get/set custom properties for this setting definition.
texts.ItemWillBeDeleteOrRestoreMessage: If you have changed the Settings, you will revert to the default Settings. Otherwise, the custom Settings are removed.
